Datastructures.Literals

Class CLiteral

  • java.lang.Object
    • Datastructures.Literals.CLiteral
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<CLiteral>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PHLiteral

    public class CLiteral
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<CLiteral>
    Created by Ohlbach on 25.08.2018.
    A CLiteral is a literal within a clause.
    Besides the literal, it contains a pointer to the clause and the position within the clause. A CLiteral can be subclassed to carry more information.

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(CLiteral cLiteral)
        compares two literals. If they belong to different clauses then the clause problemId are compared. If they belong to the same clause, then the literals are compared
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<CLiteral>
        Parameters:
        cLiteral - another CLiteral.
        Returns:
        -1,0,1 according to the order
